content: देवनः [दीव्यत्यनेन दिव् करणे ल्युट्] A die. --नं {@--1@} Beauty, splendour, lustre. {@--2@} Gaming, gambling, a game at dice. {@--3@} Play, sport, pastime. {@--4@} A pleasure-ground, a garden. {@--5@} A lotus. {@--6@} Emulation, desire to excel. {@--7@} Affair, business. {@--8@} Praise. {@--9@} Going, motion. {@--10@} Grief, lamentation, sorrow. --ना {@--1@} Gambling, a game at dice. {@--2@} Sport, pastime. {@--3@} Lamentation.
